name: Show No Mercy
rule: Score this in an end phase if 3 or more enemy fighters are out of action.

name: Song of Hatred
rule: Score this immediately if your warband successfully casts their second or subsequent spell in this phase.

name: Strike Swiftly
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with a Charge action.

name: Vengeful Revenants
rule: Score this in an end phase if at least one friendly fighter is out of action, and at least twice as many enemy fighters as friendly fighters are out of action.

name: Curse of the Dwindling
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within five hexes of the caster. That fighter's Attack actions have -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1). This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

name: Healing Amphora
rule: Choose a friendly Gallanghann or a friendly fighter adjacent to a friendly Gallanghann and roll a defence dice. On a roll of Block or Critical success remove up to two wound tokens from that fighter's fighter card. Otherwise remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

name: Last Guardians
rule: Choose a friendly fighter that does not have a Guard token. Place a Guard token next to them.

name: Leech Power
rule: Play this only if a friendly Ylthari is holding an objective. Remove that objective from the battlefield and remove up to one wound token from that Ylthari's fighter card.

name: Mesmerising Gaze
rule: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter and choose one: remove the enemy fighter's Guard tokens, or place a Move token next to the enemy fighter.

name: Pangs of the Great Lack
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within five hexes of the caster. That fighter suffers 1 damage.

name: Revenant Rage
rule: The first Attack action in the next activation has +1 Dice.

name: Springseed Step
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Move action. Choose another friendly fighter and push them up to three hexes. They must end this push adjacent to the fighter that moved.

name: Strength of the Burgeoning
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage.

name: Writhing Roots
rule: The first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation has -2 Move (to a minimum of 0).

name: Cage of Thorns
rule: [Hex 3 Focus - Dmg 1] If this Attack action succeeds, place a Move token next to the target.

name: Constant Growth
rule: +1 Wounds.

name: Enraged Spite
rule:
[Hex 3 Sword 2 Dmg 1]
Cleave

name: Inescapable Grasp
rule: Rolls of Dodge are not successes in the defence rolls of enemy fighters targeted by this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

name: Menacing Step
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Move action that ends adjacent to at least one other friendly fighter, push this fighter up to two hexes. The push must end with this fighter adjacent to the enemy fighter.

name: Pinning Shot
rule: This fighter is considered to be a supporting fighter for adjacent friendly fighters.

name: Spiteful Thorns
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 1 that targets this fighter and succeeds, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success the attacker suffers 1 damage.

name: Unflinching Guardian
rule: Reaction: During an enemy fighter's Attack action that targets a friendly fighter supported by this fighter, after the defence roll but before the Attack action succeeds or fails, you can re-roll one defence dice.

name: Vengeful Blow
rule: [Hex 1 Sword 2 Dmg 1] This Attack action has +1 Dice and +1 Damage for each friendly fighter that is out of action.

name: Warding Stance
rule: +1 Defence.

name: Acolyte of the Katophranes
rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have at least one surviving friendly fighter that has at least one Katophrane Tome. Choose a surviving friendly. Gain 1 glory point for each Katophrane Tome that fighter has.

name: Aggressive Commander
rule: Score this in the third end phase if you took the first activation in each round.

name: All or Nothing
rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have scored no objective cards this game. If you do, you cannot score any other objective cards.

name: Annihilation
rule: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters have been taken out of action.

name: Arcane Implosion
rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action while attempting to cast a spell.

name: Arcane Torrent
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter successfully casts a spell and there are two or more Critical success in the casting roll.

name: Biding Your Time
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have at least one fighter on the battlefield and your warband took no Attack actions in the preceding action phase.

name: Bloodless Skirmish
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no fighters out of action.

name: Branching Fate
rule: Score this immediately if you roll three or more dice in an attack or defence roll and they all show a different symbol.

name: Brute Force
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action succeeds against an enemy fighter who has two or more supporting fighters more than the friendly fighter.

name: Building Momentum
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored at least 2 other objective cards in this phase.

name: Calculated Risk
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a Move action through a lethal hex that damages them but doesn't take them out of action.

name: Catching Up
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have fewer glory points than an opponent.

name: Charmed Life
rule: Score this in an end phase if you removed at least 3 wound tokens from a single fighter, and that fighter was not taken out of action, in the preceding action phase.

name: Combination Strike
rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored at least two objective cards in the preceding action phase.

name: Conquest
rule: Score this in the third end phase if all of your surviving fighters are in your opponent's territory.

name: Cornered
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action that is only successful because their target is Trapped.

name: Dashed Hopes
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took at least one Inspired enemy fighter out of action in the preceding action phase.

name: Death from Afar
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action while at least three hexes from that fighter.

name: Denial
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

name: Devastation
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase.

name: Didn't Even Want It
rule: Score this in an end phase if an enemy fighter is holding objective 1.

name: Digging Deep
rule: Score this in an end phase if you drew at least four power and/or objective cards in the preceding action phase.

name: Disdain for Knowledge
rule: Score this card immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action, and that fighter has at least one Katophrane Tome.

name: Envious Acquisition
rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold an objective held by an enemy fighter at the beginning of the round.

name: Every Trick in the Book
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have no power cards in your hand.

name: Extreme Flank
rule: Score this in an end phase if there is a friendly fighter on an edge hex and another friendly fighter on an edge hex on the opposite edge of the battlefield to the first fighter. Where there is more than one opposite edge, it must be the furthest of these edges.

name: Finish Them
rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action with a Damage characteristic of 1.

name: Fired Up
rule: Score this in an end phase if at least one surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

name: Frugal
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have at least 3 unspent glory points.

name: Ganging Up
rule: Score this immediately if all hexes adjacent to a single enemy fighter (other than blocked or incomplete hexes) contain friendly fighters.

name: Get Thee Hence
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action drives an enemy fighter back two or more hexes.

name: Giant-slayer
rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes a fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or more out of action.

name: Girded for Battle
rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) have at least one upgrade.

name: Grand Melee
rule: Score this in an end phase if at least three enemy fighters were damaged in the preceding action phase.

name: Great Gains
rule: Score this in an end phase if you gained at least 5 glory points in this round.

name: Hale and Whole
rule: Score this in an end phase if no friendly fighters are out of action and no friendly fighters have wound tokens on their fighter cards.

name: Heroic Effort
rule: Score this in an end phase if you activated the same fighter four times in the preceding action phase.

name: Hoarder
rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have at least 9 unspent glory points.

name: Hold Objective 1
rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 1.

name: Hold Objective 2
rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 2.

name: Hold Objective 3
rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 3.

name: Hold Objective 4
rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 4.

name: Hold Objective 5
rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective 5.

name: Hold What We Have
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have at least one fighter on the battlefield and your warband made no Move actions in the preceding action phase.

name: Indomitable Defender
rule: Score this in an end phase if a single surviving friendly fighter was the target of at least three Attack actions in the preceding action phase and was not taken out of action.

name: Interdiction
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy wizard out of action in the preceding action phase.

name: Keep Chopping
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband made an Attack action in four or more activations in the preceding action phase.

name: Keep Moving
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband made a Move action in four or more activations in the preceding action phase.

name: Keep Them Guessing
rule: (Errata update) Score this in an end phase if your warband made at least four different actions from the following list in the preceding action phase: Move (other than as part of a Charge), Attack (other than as part of a Charge), Charge, Guard, another action on a fighter card (other than a reaction).

name: Lethal Repertoire
rule: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter made an Attack action in the preceding action phase printed on an upgrade that you played in the same phase.

name: Loner
rule: Score this in an end phase if at least one surviving friendly fighter has no other fighter within three hexes.

name: Longstrider
rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes their second or subsequent Move action in a single action phase.

name: Magical Mastery
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband successfully cast six or more spells in the preceding action phase.

name: Magical Storm
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband successfully cast four or more spells in the preceding action phase.

name: Magical Void
rule: Score this in an end phase if an opponent's warband attempted to cast at least one spell and did not successfully cast any spells in the preceding phase.

name: Martyred
rule: Score this immediately if the first fighter taken out of action in this round is a friendly fighter.

name: Massive Overkill
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action that deals an amount of damage that is at least twice the target's Wounds characteristic.

name: Master of Mayhem
rule: Score this immediately if you use your warband's third action or card that Scatters in the same phase.

name: Master of Terrain
rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a lethal hex.

name: Neck and Neck
rule: Score this in an end phase if you and an opponent are tied for the same number of glory points (at least 1).

name: No Heroes
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are at least three surviving friendly fighters, and none of them are Inspired.

name: No Openings
rule: Score this in an end phase if your opponent scored no objectives in the preceding action phase.

name: Nowhere to Go
rule: Score this immediately if each hex adjacent to an enemy fighter is either occupied, blocked or lethal.

name: On a Roll
rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored at least four other objective cards in this round.

name: One Fate
rule: Score this immediately if you roll three or more dice in an attack or defence roll and they all show the same symbol.

name: Opening Gambit
rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored at least one objective card in the preceding action phase.

name: Our Powers Combined
rule: Score this immediately if all of the successes (at least two) in your attack or defence roll were support symbols.

name: Patient Commander
rule: Score this in the third end phase if you took the second activation in each round.

name: Peerless Fighter
rule: Score this immediately if there are two or more Critical success in your attack roll.

name: Preserve Life
rule: Score this in an end phase if you removed at least one wound token from each of at least two surviving friendly fighters in the preceding action phase.

name: Preserve Their Knowledge
rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) have at least one Katophrane Tome.

name: Press the Advantage
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have more glory points than an opponent.

name: Quick on Your Feet
rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) made a Move action in the preceding action phase.

name: Scorched Earth
rule: Score this immediately if your warband removes an objective from the battlefield.

name: Seize the Initiative
rule: Score this immediately if you have three or more Critical success when rolling to determine who takes the first activation in a round and win that roll.

name: Singled Out
rule: Score this in an end phase if a surviving friendly fighter has three or more upgrades.

name: Solid Gains
rule: Score this in an end phase if you gained at least 3 glory points in this round.

name: Sorcerous Duel
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy wizard out of action with a spell.

name: Sorcerous Retort
rule: Score this immediately if your warband successfully casts a spell as a reaction.

name: Sorcerous Scouring
rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action with a spell.

name: Stand Firm
rule: Score this immediately if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) have one or more Guard tokens.

name: Strong Start
rule: Score this immediately if the first fighter taken out of action in this round is an enemy fighter.

name: Supremacy
rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives.

name: Swift Beheading
rule: (Errata update) Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase, and that leader was the first fighter taken out of action in this game.

name: Tactical Supremacy 1-4
rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 1 and 4.

name: Tactical Supremacy 2-5
rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 2 and 5.

name: Tempting Target
rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter with at least two upgrades out of action.

name: Thin Their Ranks
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters are out of action.

name: Tireless Slayer
rule: Score this in an end phase if a single friendly fighter took three or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase.

name: Total Dominance
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no surviving enemy fighters and no friendly fighters out of action.

name: Trash to Treasure
rule: Score this immediately if an opponent discards three objective cards in an end phase.

name: United
rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least two) are in a single group with each fighter adjacent to at least one other friendly fighter.

name: Versatile Fighter
rule: Score this in an end phase if the same friendly fighter made both an Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 and an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more in the preceding action phase.

name: What Armour?
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action with Cleave succeeds.

name: Witch-Slayer
rule: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy wizard out of action.

name: With Our Bare Hands
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are at least three surviving friendly fighters, and no surviving friendly fighter has an upgrade.

name: Abasoth's Unmaking
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose an objective token within four hexes of the caster. Remove it from the battlefield.

name: Abasoth's Withering
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter has -1 Wounds (to a minimum of 1). This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

name: Aetherflux
rule: Until the next power step, spells that would require Channel instead require Focus and vice versa.

name: Aggressive Defence
rule: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. You cannot make a defence roll, but the target of the Attack action cannot be driven back. After the Attack action, if the friendly fighter survives, immediately make an attack action with that fighter that targets their attacker.

name: Amnesiac Backlash
rule: Reaction Critical success: Cast this spell after an enemy fighter casts a spell. If this spell is cast, that fighter suffers 1 damage and they can no longer cast spells. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

name: Arcane Recall
rule: Gambit Spell (Critical success): If this spell is cast choose one gambit spell from your power discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Arcane Shield
rule: Gambit Spell (FocusFocus): If this spell is cast, reduce all damage suffered by the caster by 1, to a minimum of 1. This spell persists until the caster is out of action.

name: Arcane Smothering
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If this spell is cast, choose one persisting spell. That spell is discarded.

name: Arcane Transposition
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, switch the positions of two adjacent fighters.

name: Baffling Illusion
rule: The first time a fighter would make a Move action in the next activation, their player instead Scatters X from the hex that fighter occupies, and pushes the fighter along the chain to the end hex. X is the fighter's Move characteristic. If the fighter cannot be pushed into a hex, the push ends in the last hex in the chain they can occupy. Place a Move token next to that fighter.

name: Black-powder Sphere
rule: Choose a hex (other than a blocked hex) within three hexes of a friendly fighter, and Scatter 1 from that hex. Then roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success, any fighter in or adjacent to the end hex suffers 1 damage.

name: Bolt of Inspiration
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, Scatter 1 from any hex on the battlefield. Any fighter in the end hex is Inspired.

name: Centre of Attention
rule: (Errata update) Choose a fighter and push all other fighters that are within 2 hexes 1 hex so that they are closer to that fighter in an order you choose.

name: Commanding Stride
rule: Push your leader up to three hexes. They must end this push on a starting hex.

name: Confusing Reflection
rule: Reaction: Play this when an enemy fighter successfully casts a spell with Scatter, before they resolve the Scatter. You resolve the Scatter instead. The effect of the spell remains the same.

name: Confusion
rule: Choose two fighters that are adjacent to each other and switch them.

name: Countercharge
rule: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action. Choose a friendly fighter and push them up to three hexes. They must end this push adjacent to the enemy fighter.

name: Damning Pact
rule: Choose a friendly wizard. They suffer 1 damage. The first time they attempt to cast a spell before the next power step, any fighter damaged by that spell suffers 1 additional damage.

name: Dancing with Death
rule: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter and fails. You can push the target up to two hexes.

name: Death Frenzy
rule: Reaction: Play this during an enemy warband's gambit or enemy fighter's Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. For each fighter adjacent to that fighter, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash the fighter being rolled for suffers 1 damage.

name: Death Grip
rule: Choose a friendly fighter. Enemy fighters adjacent to that fighter can't be pushed until the next power step.

name: Determined Effort
rule: +1 Dice for the first Attack action in the next activation.

name: Emboldened
rule: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter and fails. Remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

name: Empathic Exchange
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter adjacent to the caster. Take up to 2 wound tokens from that fighter's fighter card and put them on the caster's fighter card.

name: Encroaching Shadow
rule: Choose an enemy fighter in an edge hex. They suffer 1 damage.

name: Entropic Curse
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter suffers 1 damage at the beginning of each round, before the first activation. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

name: Ephemeral Form
rule: The first fighter to be the target of an Attack action in the next activation has a Defence characteristic (before other modifiers) of Dodge 2, instead of their usual characteristic.

name: Fearful Visage
rule: Choose a fighter. The first fighter to make an Attack action while adjacent to that fighter in the next activation has -1 Dice to a minimum of 1.

name: Flexible Strategy
rule: Discard an objective card and draw an objective card.

name: Ghoulish Pact
rule: Choose a friendly fighter and an upgrade card from your hand that you can apply to that fighter. That fighter suffers 1 damage. If they survive, apply the upgrade to that fighter.

name: Grievous Riposte
rule: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action with a Range of 1 that targets a friendly fighter and fails, if there are any Critical success in your defence roll. The attacker suffers 2 damage.

name: Grinding Earth
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose an empty hex adjacent to the caster and place the chasm token on it. A hex with a chasm token is a lethal hex. Remove the token at the end of the action phase.

name: Haymaker
rule: +2 Dice for the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation. You cannot make defence rolls for that fighter. The latter effect persists until that fighter is out of action or the end of the round, whichever happens first.

name: Healing Pulse
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter within four hexes of the caster. Remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card at the beginning of each round, before the first activation. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

name: Imbue with Life
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose an objective token within four hexes of the caster. Scatter 2 from that token's hex, and place the objective token in the end hex. If the end hex is blocked, lethal or contains an objective token, or if the chain would leave the battlefield, leave the objective token where it is.

name: Incredible Leap
rule: The first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation can pass through blocked and occupied hexes, and treats lethal hexes as normal hexes. They must end this move in an empty hex.

name: Infinite Riches
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel): If this spell is cast, choose one upgrade from your power discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Instinctive Denial
rule: Reaction: Play this when an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter casts a spell, before the spell is resolved. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of Block or Critical success that spell is not cast.

name: Irresistible Prize
rule: (Errata update) Choose an objective token. Push all fighters that are within 2 hexes 1 hex so that they are standing on or closer to that token in an order you choose.

name: Lethal Ward
rule: Choose an objective token. Any fighter in the same hex as that token suffers 1 damage.

name: Levitation
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, the caster treats lethal hexes as normal hexes. This spell persists until the caster is out of action or the end of the phase, whichever happens first.

name: Lifesurge
rule: Remove one wound token from all fighter cards that have at least one wound token.

name: Magical Damping
rule: Reaction (Focus): Cast this spell during an attempt to cast a spell, after the dice are rolled but before the spell is resolved or fails (and before the defence roll, if it is a spell Attack action). If this spell is cast, any damage caused by the other spell is reduced by 1.

name: Magical Dearth
rule: Until the end of the power step, only rolls of Critical success are successes when a fighter attempts to cast a spell.

name: Mirror Move
rule: Reaction: Play this after an opponent pushes a fighter. Choose a different fighter and push them the same number of hexes.

name: Noble Sacrifice
rule: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that targets your leader, before any dice are rolled. Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to your leader, and roll a defence dice. On a roll of Single support, Double support or Critical success, switch the positions of the fighter you chose and your leader. The fighter you chose is now the target of the Attack action.

name: One Step Ahead
rule: You can only play this card in the final power step of a round. Choose an opponent and name an objective, then roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success that opponent cannot score that objective in the subsequent end phase.

name: Piling On
rule: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage for each supporting fighter after the first.

name: Pit Trap
rule: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that drives an enemy fighter back. They suffer 1 damage.

name: Power Surge
rule: Reaction: Play this during an attempt to cast a spell, after the dice are rolled but before the spell is resolved or fails, if at least one Critical success was rolled in the casting roll. Add a Critical success to the casting roll.

name: Quick Exchange
rule: Choose two adjacent friendly fighters who each have at least one upgrade that could be applied to the other fighter. Take an upgrade from each fighter and apply it to the other fighter. Each fighter must be eligible for that upgrade.

name: Quintok's Gamble
rule: Gambit Spell (Critical success): If this spell is cast, shuffle your power discard pile face down, then add the top card to your hand.

name: Razormaw Swarm
rule: Gambit Spell (Critical success): If this spell is cast, Scatter 3 from the caster's hex. Any fighter in any hex in the chain suffers 2 damage.

name: Regal Vision
rule: Choose a friendly fighter that is holding an objective. That fighter becomes Inspired.

name: Rend the Earth
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel): If this spell is cast, all fighters adjacent to the caster suffer 1 damage.

name: Revoke
rule: Choose one persisting ploy. That ploy is discarded.

name: Shadowed Step
rule: Choose a friendly fighter with no Move or Charge tokens and place them on an empty hex in no one's territory. Place a Move token next to them.

name: Shifting Reflection
rule: Choose a friendly fighter and an enemy fighter that are both holding an objective. Switch those fighters' positions.

name: Sidestep
rule: Choose a friendly fighter and push them one hex.

name: Silence
rule: Choose an enemy fighter. They cannot attempt to cast spells for the remainder of the power step.

name: Sorcerous Insight
rule: Gambit Spell (FocusFocus): If this spell is cast, choose one ploy from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Sorcerous Riposte
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel) Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that targets a friendly wizard and fails. If this spell is cast, the attacker suffers 2 damage.

name: Soul Drain
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus) Reaction: Cast this spell after an Attack action or gambit that takes an enemy fighter out of action. If this spell is cast, remove up to one wound token from the caster's fighter card.

name: Sphere of Aqshy
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter suffers 1 damage.

name: Sphere of Azyr
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter holding an objective. They suffer 1 damage.

name: Sphere of Chamon
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose a fighter within three hexes of the caster. That fighter has a Defence characteristic (before other modifiers) of Block 1. This spell persists until the next power step or that fighter is out of action, whichever happens first.

name: Sphere of Ghur
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, the first Attack action made by a fighter standing within four hexes of the caster has +1 Dice. This spell persists until such an Attack action is made or the caster is out of action, whichever happens first.

name: Sphere of Ghyran
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel): If this spell is cast, choose the caster or a friendly fighter adjacent to the caster. Remove 1 wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

name: Sphere of Hysh
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel): If this spell is cast, Attack actions in the next activation have +1 Dice.

name: Sphere of Shyish
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within three hexes of the caster. Wound tokens cannot be removed from that fighter's card. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

name: Sphere of Ulgu
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If this spell is cast, Attack actions in the next activation have -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1.

name: Spiked Surface
rule: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action in which the target fighter is trapped and is in an edge hex and/or adjacent to a blocked hex. The target fighter suffers 1 damage.

name: Spirit Sacrifice
rule: Choose a friendly wizard. They suffer 1 damage. The first time that fighter attempts to cast a spell, roll an extra dice in the casting roll. This effect persists until that fighter attempts to cast a spell or is out of action, whichever happens first.

name: Stand and Shoot
rule: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action. Choose a friendly fighter that is adjacent to them, and make an Attack action with that fighter that has a Range of 3 or more. It must target the enemy fighter, and that fighter cannot be driven back by this Attack action.

name: Strategic Sorcery
rule: Gambit Spell (FocusFocus): If this spell is cast, choose one objective card from your objective discard pile and add it to your hand, then discard an objective card if you have more than three in your hand.

name: Sudden Paranoia
rule: Enemy fighters cannot provide support during the first Attack action in the next activation.

name: Taunting Challenge
rule: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action. Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to that fighter. If the enemy fighter does not target that fighter with their subsequent Attack action, the enemy fighter is no longer Inspired and cannot be Inspired. The latter effect persists until the enemy fighter is out of action.

name: Terrifying Visage
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If this spell is cast, enemy fighters adjacent to the caster have -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1, when they make Attack actions. This spell persists until the caster is out of action.

name: Trading Up
rule: Choose a friendly fighter with at least one upgrade. Discard one upgrade from that fighter, and apply another upgrade to that fighter from your hand.

name: Transfixing Stare
rule: Choose an enemy fighter within two hexes of a friendly fighter and place a Move token next to them.

name: Unchecked Energy
rule: Choose a lethal hex. Roll an attack dice for each fighter in or adjacent to that hex. On a roll of Smash or Critical success the fighter being rolled for suffers 1 damage.

name: Unfocused Blast
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, do the following. Scatter 1 from the caster's hex: any fighter in the end hex suffers 1 damage. Do this two more times, scattering from the caster's hex each time.

name: Vertigo
rule: Reaction: Play this during an action or gambit that uses the scatter token, after the scatter token is placed but before any dice are rolled. Choose how the scatter token is oriented.

name: Vital Surge
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel): If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter and remove up to two wound tokens from their fighter card.

name: Whip into a Frenzy
rule: Choose a friendly fighter. They suffer 1 damage. Their first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage.

name: Arcane Familiar
rule: Each time this fighter attempts to cast a spell, after the casting roll, you can change one of the symbols rolled to Channel.

name: Arcane Focus
rule: Action: This fighter's next casting roll in this phase has Innate (Focus).

name: Arcane Savant
rule: +1 Wizard level. Apply this upgrade only to a level 1 wizard.

name: Archer's Focus
rule: You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll each time this fighter makes an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more.

name: Bag of Tricks
rule: Action: Search your power deck for a card, reveal it and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your power deck and place a Charge token next to this fighter.

name: Binding Shard
rule: Fighters adjacent to this fighter cannot be pushed (or driven back).

name: Blessing of Argentine
rule: Reaction: During an adjacent enemy's Attack action that damages this fighter, their attacker suffers 1 damage.

name: Blessing of Hydragos
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's Attack action that succeeds, push this fighter up to two hexes.

name: Blessing of Ignax
rule: Action: This fighter's next Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in this round has +2 Damage.

name: Blessing of Vytrix
rule: Innate (Channel)

name: Butcher's Eye
rule: If there are any Critical success in an attack roll for this fighter's Attack action, resolve that Attack action as if it had Cleave.

name: Chained Spite
rule: Action: Scatter 3 from this fighter's hex. Choose one fighter standing in a hex in the chain. They suffer 1 damage.

name: Challenge Seeker
rule: When this fighter makes an Attack action that targets a fighter with a higher Wounds characteristic than itself, that Attack action has +1 Dice.

name: Champion's Fortitude
rule: You can re-roll one defence dice each time you make a defence roll for this fighter.

name: Circlet of Companionship
rule: When this fighter is adjacent to two or more friendly fighters, this fighter has +1 Defence.

name: Cloak of Shadows
rule: While this fighter is adjacent to no fighters, this fighter has +1 Defence.

name: Crown of Avarice
rule: (Errata update) Reaction: During an opponent's gambit or during an enemy fighter's Attack action that will take this fighter out of action, after the deal damage step, pick one opponent and take up to one of their unspent glory points.

name: Dirty Fighting
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's Attack action that targets an adjacent enemy fighter and fails, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success that enemy fighter suffers 1 damage.

name: Distracting Blow
rule: [Hex 1 Sword 2 Dmg 2] Reaction: When an adjacent enemy fighter attempts to cast a spell, but before the casting roll, make this Attack action.

name: Disturbing Presence
rule: Enemy fighters adjacent to this fighter cannot make Charge actions.

name: Duellist's Speed
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's Attack action, push them up to one hex.

name: Earthing Stone
rule: If this fighter is standing on an objective token in a player's territory, no fighters in that territory are considered to be holding objectives.

name: Enchanted Greaves
rule: This fighter treats lethal hexes as normal hexes.

name: Envoy's Prerogative
rule: Action: Draw an objective card, then discard an objective card.

name: Escape Artist
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, push this fighter up to one hex.

name: Fading Form
rule: This fighter treats lethal hexes as normal hexes and can move through blocked and occupied hexes, but cannot end their move in a blocked or occupied hex.

name: Faneway Crystal
rule: When this fighter makes a Move action, they do not move normally. Instead, place them on any objective token, then discard this card. It is still considered to be a Move action.

name: Fated Blade
rule: 1 Smash 2 - Roll five attack dice each time this Attack action succeeds. Its Damage characteristic is equal to the number of Smash and Critical success rolled.

name: Fighter's Ferocity
rule: If you score a critical hit when making an Attack action with this fighter, that Attack action has +1 Damage.

name: Gallant's Courage
rule: When this fighter is the target of an Attack action, they cannot be driven back if there are any successes in their defence roll.

name: Gloryseeker
rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Attack actions that target a fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more.

name: Great Fortitude
rule: +1 Wounds.

name: Great Speed
rule: +1 Move.

name: Great Strength
rule: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

name: Hammer of Scorn
rule:
[Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 2]
Knockback 2

name: Horrifying Armour
rule: -1 Wound (to a minimum of 1). Adjacent enemy fighters' Attack actions have -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1.

name: Hunter's Tenacity
rule: Reaction: After this fighter makes an Attack action against an adjacent enemy fighter that drives them back, push this fighter into the hex the other was in.

name: Loathe Stone
rule: Players roll 1 fewer dice in the casting roll (to a minimum of 1) for fighter that attempt to cast a spell within two hexes of this fighter.

name: Low Cunning
rule: Fighters supported by this fighter have +1 Damage on their Attack actions with a Range or 1 or 2.

name: Lucky Trinket
rule: Reaction: During an enemy fighter's spell or spell Attack action, if the spell is cast and the caster is within three hexes of this fighter, roll three magic dice. If you roll at least one Critical success that spell is not cast and is not resolved. In either case, discard this card.

name: Mirror of Spite
rule: Reaction: During an enemy fighter's Attack action that takes this fighter out of action, before removing them from the battlefield, all adjacent enemy fighters suffer 1 damage.

name: Mutating Maul
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 2] When a fighter makes this Attack action, choose Cleave or Knockback 1. This Attack action has that rule in this activation.

name: Nullstone Arrows
rule: [Hex 4 Hammer 2 Dmg 1] You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Nullstone Axe
rule:
[Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 2] You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard
 [Hex 3 Hammer 2 Dmg 1] After a fighter makes this Attack action, discard this upgrade. You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Nullstone Dagger
rule: [Hex 1 Sword 3 Dmg 2] If there are any Critical success in the attack roll, this Attack action has Cleave. You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Nullstone Darts
rule: [Hex 3 Sword 3 Dmg 1] You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Nullstone Hammer
rule:
[Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 2]
Knockback 1 You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Nullstone Mace
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 2] You can re-roll up to two dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Nullstone Spear
rule: [Hex 2 Hammer 2 Dmg 2] You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Nullstone Sword
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 3 Dmg 2] You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

name: Paradox Armour
rule: When the target of an Attack action, this fighter counts rolls of Dodge and Block as successes, but does not count rolls or Critical success as successes or critical successes.

name: Parrying Blade
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 1] Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be pushed back and you make this Attack action.

name: Possessed Weapon
rule: After each Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 this fighter makes, they suffer 1 damage. Their Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage.

name: Potion of Clarity
rule: Reaction: During this fighter's attempt to cast a spell, after the casting roll, discard this card. You can re-roll one dice from the casting roll.

name: Potion of Constitution
rule: Reaction: During an Attack action or gambit that will damage this fighter, discard this card. Reduce the damage suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

name: Potion of Grace
rule: Reaction: After a Move token is placed next to this fighter, discard this card. Remove that token.

name: Potion of Rage
rule: Reaction: During this fighter's Attack action, before any dice are rolled, discard this card. The Attack action has +2 Dice until the action is resolved.

name: Quick Learner
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Attack action or another warband's gambit that damages this fighter but does not take them out of action, draw a power card.

name: Ready for the Fight
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action, you can push this fighter up to two hexes. This push must bring them adjacent to the enemy fighter.

name: Regenerative Charm
rule: Remove up to one wound token from this fighter's fighter card at the beginning of each round.

name: Reinforced Armour
rule: This fighter takes no damage from Attack actions with a Damage characteristic (before modifiers) of 1, unless those result in a critical hit.

name: Ritual Dagger
rule: [Hex 1 Smash - Dmg 2] When a fighter makes this Attack action, the Dice characteristic (before other modifiers) is equal to their wizard level. If there are any Critical success in the attack roll, this Attack action has Cleave.

name: Scroll of Recall
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's gambit spell is resolved, discard this card and roll a magic dice. On a roll of Channel, place the gambit spell on top of your power deck instead of on your power discard pile.

name: Seeking Blade
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 1] Rolls of Dodge aren't successes in defence rolls for targets of this Attack action.

name: Seeking Stones
rule: [Hex 3 Hammer 2 Dmg 1] Rolls of Dodge are not considered successes against this Attack action.

name: Shifting Map
rule: If this fighter is not out of action in the third end phase, draw an objective card. If it is worth 1 glory point, you gain 1 glory point (you cannot score the card you draw).

name: Slumbering Key
rule: If this fighter is not out of action in the third end phase, gain 1 glory point.

name: Spinning Defence
rule: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be pushed. Scatter 2 from this fighter's hex and push this fighter along the chain to the end hex. If the fighter cannot be pushed into a hex, the push ends in the last hex in the chain they can occupy.

name: Spiteful Charm
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Attack action that damages this fighter, discard this card. Choose one of the enemy fighter's upgrades. That card is discarded.

name: Strong-arm
rule: Action: Push an adjacent enemy fighter up to one hex.

name: Sudden Growth
rule: -2 Move (to a minimum of 0), +2 Wounds.

name: Swordbreaker
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 3 Dmg 2] On a critical hit, you can choose one of the target fighter's upgrades that confers an Attack action. That card is discarded.

name: Tome of Diseases
rule:
Katophrane Tome
Action: Choose an adjacent enemy fighter. They suffer 1 damage.

name: Tome of Glories
rule:
Katophrane Tome
Action: If this fighter is holding an objective, gain 1 glory point. Place a Charge token next to this fighter.

name: Tome of Healing
rule:
(Errata update)
Katophrane Tome
Action: Choose this fighter or an adjacent friendly fighter. Remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

name: Tome of Incantations
rule:
Katophrane Tome
Each time this fighter attempts to cast a spell, after the casting roll, you can change one of the symbols rolled to Channel.

name: Tome of Insight
rule:
(Errata update)
Katophrane Tome
Action: Choose an opponent. They must reveal the power cards in their hand to you.

name: Tome of Offerings
rule:
Katophrane Tome
If this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point.

name: Tome of Vitality
rule:
Katophrane Tome
+1 Wounds.

name: Tome of Warfare
rule:
Katophrane Tome
Action: Choose this fighter or an adjacent friendly fighter. Their next Attack action has +1 Dice.

name: Touch of Death
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 1 Dmg 3] Place a Charge token next to any fighter damaged by this Attack action.

name: Unstoppable Force
rule: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 gain Knockback 1.

name: Voidsceptre
rule: Action: Choose a persisting effect or spell that is affecting a fighter within two hexes of this fighter. That effect or spell ends.

name: Warding Scroll
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's spell is cast, but before it is resolved, if this fighter is on the battlefield, discard this card. The spell is not cast.

name: Well of Power
rule: While this fighter is Inspired, you can roll an extra dice when they attempt to cast a spell.

name: Focal Formation
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly Rastus and a friendly Ammis are both holding objectives after an activation.

name: Storm's Fury
rule: The first friendly fighter's Attack action in the next activation has +1 Damage.

name: Hand of Sigmar
rule: Innate (Smash)

name: Deathly Clutches
rule: Score this immediately when two or more friendly fighters become Inspired at the start of your activation.

name: Freezing Fear
rule: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to your leader. Place a Move token next to the enemy fighter.

name: Haunting Obsession
rule: This fighter cannot be pushed while they are adjacent to any enemy fighters. If a push takes this fighter adjacent to any enemy fighters, the push ends in that hex.

name: Architect of Fate
rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter is the target of an enemy Attack action with a Dice characteristic of 3 or more that fails.

name: Forewarned
rule: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. You can re-roll any number of dice in that fighter's defence roll.

name: Mark of Favour
rule: Roll a defence dice each time this fighter suffers any amount of damage. On a roll of Critical success this fighter does not suffer that damage.

name: Petty Vindication
rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored two or more other objective cards in this round.

name: Leaping Loon
rule: Your leader has +2 Defence in the next activation.

name: Really Pointy Stick
rule:
[Hex 2 Sword 2 Dmg 2]
Cleave

name: Worthy Kill
rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes an Attack action that takes an enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more out of action.

name: Dark Portent
rule: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. Rolls of Critical success in the attack roll are not successes or critical successes.

name: Writhing Charm
rule: When exactly 1 damage would be caused to this fighter, this fighter does not duffer that damage. When this happens, roll a defence dice. On anything but a Block discard this card.

name: Territorial
rule: Score this in an end phase if no enemy fighters are in your territory.

name: Horrible Grin
rule: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 1 that targets a friendly Mollog but does not take that Mollog out of action. The enemy fighter is no longer Inspired, and cannot be Inspired. This effect persists.

name: Spark of Sentience
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's activation, draw a power card.

name: Steady Aim
rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's attack roll includes only successes.

name: Duardin Resilience
rule: The first time a friendly fighter suffers any amount of damage in the next activation, they only suffer 1 damage.

name: Disciplined Retreat
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's Attack action, push them up to two hexes.

name: Avatar of Vengeance
rule: Score this immediately if there is only one surviving friendly fighter after an activation.

name: Bitter Vengeance
rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice for each friendly fighter that is out of action.

name: Spitethorn Arrow
rule: [Hex 4 Hammer 3 Dmg 2] Rolls of Dodge are not successes against this Attack action. Discard this card after making this Attack action.

name: Burst of Speed
rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes their second or subsequent Move action in this phase.

name: Champions All
rule: Score this immediately when a second or subsequent enemy fighter is taken out of action in this phase, and each one was taken out of action by an Attack action made by a different friendly fighter.

name: Chokepoint
rule: Score this in an end phase if a fighter is in each hex (other than blocked hexes) in no one's territory.

name: Fusillade
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband made an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more in four or more activations in the preceding action phase.

name: Grievous Toll
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters, and no friendly fighters, were taken out of action in the preceding action phase.

name: Method in the Madness
rule: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a spell that has Scatter.

name: Overpower
rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter successfully casts a spell if there were one or more Critical success in the casting roll.

name: Shortcut
rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter is taken out of one hex and immediately placed in a different hex, but not as a result of a push or a Move action.

name: Spike
rule: Score this immediately after an enemy fighter suffers damage, and they have suffered 5 or more damage in this phase (damage in excess of their Wounds characteristic counts).

name: Staying Power
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are five or more surviving friendly fighters.

name: Strange Demise
rule: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a spell that damaged them or by a spell Attack action that damaged them.

name: Warning Shot
rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's Attack action with a Range of 3 or more fails.

name: Arrow Snare
rule: Reaction: Play this during an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 3 or more that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. Place a Guard token next to that friendly fighter.

name: Fizzle
rule: Reaction: Play this when an enemy fighter successfully casts a spell. Roll a magic dice. On a roll of Channel that spell is not cast.

name: Fumble
rule: The first Attack action made by an enemy fighter in the next activation has -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1.

name: Galvanised
rule: Reaction: Play this after an Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. +2 Dice to the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

name: Inspired Attack
rule: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 made by an Inspired friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and +1 Damage.

name: Keen Avarice
rule: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and Cleave if the target is holding an objective.

name: Long Shot
rule: The first Attack action with a Range or 3 or more made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Range.

name: Seggut's Salvo
rule: Gambit Spell (ChannelChannel): If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within three hexes of the caster. The fighter you chose suffers 1 damage and you can push them one hex - this push must take them further away from the caster.

name: Shadow Shape
rule: Gambit Spell (Channel): If this spell is cast, the caster cannot be pushed. This spell persists until the end of the round.

name: Sorcerous Flourish
rule: Reaction: Play this after resolving a spell cast by a friendly fighter that damaged one or more enemy fighters. Choose one of those enemy fighters. That fighter suffers 1 damage.

name: Two Steps Forward
rule: Choose two friendly fighters and push each of them one hex. Then choose an opponent: they choose one fighter from their warband and push them up to one hex.

name: Upper Hand
rule: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action, when the attack roll and defence roll are compared. If the rolls are tied, add one success to the attack roll.

name: Blazing Soul
rule: This fighter is Inspired and cannot be un-Inspired. This upgrade cannot be applied to a fighter that cannot be Inspired.

name: Eldritch Ward
rule: When this fighter suffers damage, reduce that damage by 1 to a minimum to 1.

name: Huge Presence
rule: When an opponent chooses a target for an Attack action, they consider this fighter's hex to be a blocked hex, unless this fighter is chosen as the target.

name: Leech Stone
rule: Wound tokens cannot be removed from the fighter cards of fighters within two hexes of this fighter.

name: Lethal Reflexes
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Move action, if that fighter left a hex adjacent to this fighter during that Move action, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success that fighter suffers 1 damage.

name: Prized Vendetta
rule: (Errata update) When you give a fighter this upgrade, choose an enemy fighter. You can re-roll any number of dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Attack actions that target the chosen fighter.

name: Quickening Greaves
rule: In each round, you can do one of the following: push this fighter one hex before the roll to determine who has the first activation. or push this fighter one hex after the final power step.

name: Spectral Armour
rule: If this fighter's Defence characteristic is Dodge, they have +1 Defence.

name: Spiritbond
rule: When you apply this upgrade, choose a friendly fighter other than the one who receives this upgrade. While the fighter you chose is on the battlefield, they are always considered to be supporting this fighter.

name: Swift as an Arrow
rule: Reaction: After an Attack action in which there were any number of Critical success in this fighter's attack or defence roll, push this fighter up to that number of hexes.

name: Unnatural Defences
rule: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 1 that damages this fighter, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success the attacking fighter suffers 1 damage.

name: Wall of Force
rule: [Hex 3 Channel - Dmg 0] This Attack action deals no damage when it is successful. It has Knockback X, where X is the number of successes in the attack roll.

name: Aetheric Mastery
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are two or more surviving friendly fighters
And: All friendly fighters are Inspired.

name: Forceful Banishment
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is driven back by a friendly fighter's Attack action that has the Knockback ability.

name: Martial Prowess
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after your warband makes a third or subsequent successful Attack action in the same phase.

name: Sacrosanct Purge
rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in this round.

name: Sally Forth
rule: Score this in an end phase if there are two or more friendly fighters adjacent to each other in enemy territory.

name: Stormforged Heroes
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are two or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more upgrades.

name: Strength in Unity
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are two or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Move tokens, and/or each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Charge tokens and/or each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Guard tokens.

name: Uncontested Might
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

name: Vengeance Satisfied
rule: Score this in an end phase if more than half of the fighters in one or more enemy warbands are out of action.

name: Vindicated Arrogance
rule: Score this in an end phase if your leader was the target of our or more Attack actions in this round and is on the battlefield.

name: Wrathful Blow
rule:
Surge, Dual: Score this immediately
If: A friendly fighter's Attack action takes an enemy fighter out of action
And: That friendly fighter has one or more wound tokens.

name: Your Turn!
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is driven back into a hex adjacent to a friendly fighter.

name: Adaptive Tactics
rule: Draw up to one objective card and up to one power card, and then discard one objective card.

name: Champions of Sigmar
rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has Innate (Single support).

name: Fulminating Blast
rule: Push an enemy fighter up to one hex.

name: Improvised Blow
rule:
Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to an enemy fighter. The chosen fighter makes the following Attack action.
 [Hex 1 Sword 3 Dmg 1]

name: Inevitable Blow
rule: Pick Cleave or Ensnare. The first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has that ability

name: Outflank
rule: Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to another fighter and push them up to two hexes.

name: Steadfast
rule: Choose a friendly fighter and give them a Guard token

name: Thunderous Smite
rule: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Range 1 Attack action that will succeed, before the deal damage step. In that step, instead of dealing damage equal to the Damage characteristic of the Attack action, the target is dealt 1 damage and each enemy fighter adjacent to the target is dealt 1 damage.

name: Unyielding Resolve
rule: Choose a friendly fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of Block or Critical success, Heal (2) that fighter, otherwise Heal (1) that fighter.

name: Vengeful Strike
rule: Reaction: Play this during an enemy fighter's Attack action that deals damage to an adjacent friendly fighter, before the drive back step. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success the friendly fighter is not driven back and makes an Attack action that targets the attacker.

name: Aetherically Charged Shield
rule: You can re-roll one dice in each defence roll made for this fighter.

name: Aetherically Charged Weapon
rule: You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll of the first Attack action this fighter makes in each round.

name: Consecrated Pendant
rule: +1 wounds

name: Enchanted Robes
rule:
+1 Move
This fighter treats lethal hexes as normal hexes.

name: Hallowed Aura
rule: Reaction: After an Attack action that deals damage to this fighter, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success Heal (1) this fighter.

name: Punishing Blow
rule:
[Hex 1 Hammer 3 Dmg 4]
Cleave After a fighter makes this Attack action, discard this card.

name: Sanctified Armour
rule: When this fighter is dealt damage, reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

name: Soul-hardened Shield
rule: When this fighter is activated, before making an action with them, give them a Guard token.

name: Spirit Flask
rule: Action: Choose one: Deal 1 damage to an adjacent enemy fighter, or Heal (2) this fighter. Discard this card.

name: Stoic Stance
rule: This fighter cannot be driven back.

name: Bitter Embrace
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are two or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Each surviving friendly fighter is adjacent to one or more enemy fighters.

name: Creeping Dread
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are three or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

name: Dominion of Death
rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have scored the most objective cards.

name: Fleeting Memories
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter finishes a Move action and entered two or more different hexes that contained an objective during that Move action.

name: Frozen in Place
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if one or more enemy fighters each have one or more Guard tokens.

name: Ghostly Torment
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are two or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Two or more surviving fighters each have one or more wound tokens.

name: Inescapable Hunger
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes a Move action through one or more blocked hexes and ends that Move action adjacent to an enemy fighter.

name: Nagash's Tithe
rule: Score this in an end phase if there are more enemy fighters out of action than friendly fighters out of action.

name: Nexus of Terror
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds the most objectives.

name: One Will
rule:
Surge, Dual: Score this immediately
If: Your warband holds one or more even numbered objectives
And: Your warband holds one or more odd numbered objectives.

name: Spectral Vortex
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is the target of a second or subsequent successful Attack action in this phase, and each Attack action was made by a different friendly fighter.

name: Tide of Malice
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are two or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

name: Call of the Grave
rule: Choose an enemy fighter and push them up to two hexes towards a friendly fighter.

name: Chilling Scream
rule: Your opponents cannot play power cards. This persists until the end of the power step.

name: Dissipate
rule: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action, before the attack roll. Choose a friendly fighter. That fighter gains Innate (Dodge). This persists until the Attack action ends or until that friendly fighter is taken out of action.

name: Echoing Spite
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Range 1 Attack action that fails. That fighter makes that Attack action again.

name: Enervating Sorrow
rule: Reaction: Play this when an opponent plays a ploy, before that ploy is resolved. That opponent can discard a power card. If they do not, the ploy is not resolved.

name: Frightful Aspect
rule: Push an enemy fighter up to one hex.

name: Shared Agony
rule: Choose a friendly fighter with one or more wound tokens and an enemy fighter adjacent to them. Heal (1) the friendly fighter. The enemy fighter is dealt 1 damage.

name: Soaring Spite
rule: Double the Move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a Move action (not as part of a Charge action) in the next activation.

name: Spectral Grasp
rule: Reduce the Move characteristic of the first fighter to be activated in the next activation by the number of friendly fighters that are out of action, to a minimum of 0.

name: Spectral Charge
rule: +1 Damage to the first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

name: Arcane Siphon
rule: Action: Choose one enemy fighter within three hexes of this fighter. Pick one of that fighter's upgrades. That upgrade is discarded. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success discard this card.

name: Debilitating Aura
rule: The Attack actions of adjacent enemy fighters have -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1).

name: Gravesand Glass
rule: Reaction: After an Attack action or ploy that takes an enemy fighter out of action, Heal (1) this fighter.

name: Hollow Hatred
rule: You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll of the first Attack action this fighter makes in each round.

name: Maddening Hunger
rule: This fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions have +1 Dice if they have a Charge token.

name: Soul Harvest
rule: Action: If one or more enemy fighters are out of action, Heal (1) this fighter, and give this fighter a Guard token.

name: Soul Leech
rule: Reaction: After this fighter makes a Move action, roll an attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success the first enemy fighter they moved through in that Move action is dealt 1 damage.

name: Spirit Blade
rule:
While one or more enemy fighters are out of action, this fighter has the following Attack action:
 [Hex 1 Sword 3 Dmg 3]
Cleave

name: Swooping Dash
rule: +2 Move.

name: Veil of Grief
rule: +1 Wounds.

name: Bestial Cunning
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when you play your third or subsequent gambit in a single round.

name: Blood Ritual
rule: Score this in an end phase if there are two or more Ritual counters on your leader's fighter card.

name: Bloodshed
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters are out of action.

name: Conquerors
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

name: Despoilers
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds three or more objectives.

name: Killing Blow
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's Attack action that targets a fighter that has no wound tokens takes the target fighter out of action.

name: Proven Superiority
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: Any enemy leaders are out of action
And: Your leader is not out of action.

name: Raiders
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if three or more friendly fighters are in enemy territory.

name: Stampede
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when a third or subsequent friendly fighter makes a Charge action in the same phase.

name: Survival of the Fittest
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are one or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Five or more fighters are out of action.

name: Swarm the Battlefield
rule: Score this in an end phase if there are one of more friendly fighters in each of the following: your territory, enemy territory, and no one's territory.

name: Taint of Ruin
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband cast two or more spells in the preceding action phase.

name: Baying Anger
rule: +1 Dice to the first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

name: Baying Hatred
rule: +1 Damage to the first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

name: Berserk Bellow
rule: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter and push them up to one hex, and up to one additional hex for each wound token the friendly fighter has.

name: Bestial Vigour
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If cast, friendly fighters have +2 Move in the next activation.

name: Blood Taunt
rule: Choose a friendly fighter. They are dealt 1 damage. Give them a Guard token. +2 Dice to the first Attack action made by that fighter in the next activation.

name: Bull Charge
rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter as part of a Charge action in the next activation has Innate (Fury).

name: Devolve
rule: Gambit Spell (Critical success): If cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter is dealt 1 damage. Then push that fighter up to one hex. This must take them closer to the caster.

name: Skirmisher
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Move action (not as part of a Charge action). That fighter can make a Range 3+ Attack action.

name: Vile Invaders
rule: Choose up to two friendly Hunters and push them up to two hexes each.

name: Weight of Numbers
rule: +1 Damage to the first Attack action made by a friendly Hunter in the next activation if there are one or more friendly supporting Hunters.

name: Blinding Attack
rule: [Hex 3 Sword 3 Dmg 1] This Attack action has +1 Damage when it targets an adjacent enemy fighter.

name: Bloodcrazed
rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions if this fighter has one or more wound tokens and/or is adjacent to a fighter that has one or more wound tokens.

name: Cursed Flint
rule:
[Hex 1 Sword 3 Dmg 1]
Cleave

name: Dogged Survivor
rule: Reaction: After an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, push this fighter up to two hexes.

name: Endless Hatred
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action, this fighter makes another Attack action. You can only use this reaction once per round.

name: Heedless of Pain
rule: +1 Wounds.

name: Jabbing Spear
rule: +1 Range to this fighter's Shortspear Attack action.

name: Savage Bolt
rule: [Hex 3 Focus - Dmg 1] Knockback 1. On a critical hit this Attack action has +1 Damage.

name: Sorcerous Trinket
rule: You can re-roll one dice in the casting roll each time this fighter attempts to cast a spell.

name: Trophy Taker
rule: When this fighter's Attack action takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 glory point.

name: Aspects of Kurnoth
rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters are Inspired.

name: Cry of the Wild
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: A friendly Karthaen made the Hunting Horn action in the previous phase
And: There is a surviving friendly Karthaen.

name: Gifts of the Kurnoth
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters each have one or more upgrades.

name: Hunt's End
rule:
Hybrid: Score this in an end phase
If: An enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or greater is out of action
Or: Your warband holds three or more objectives.

name: Kurnoth's Snare
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is pushed into a lethal hex.

name: Purifying Rites
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds all objectives in one or more player's territory.

name: Ritual Kill
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when your warband takes an enemy fighter standing in the same hex as an objective out of action.

name: Run Down
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action made as part of a Charge action.

name: Run Through
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when your leader takes an enemy fighter out of action.

name: Safety in Swiftness
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters each have one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

name: Slay the Corrupted
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters are out of action.

name: Soulbinding
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when your warband casts a spell.

name: Binding Wind
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. Give that fighter a Move token.

name: Fleet of Foot
rule: Choose a friendly fighter that has no Move or Charge tokens. They make a Move action.

name: Healing Breeze
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If cast, pick a hex within four hexes of the caster. Heal (1) any fighters in that hex and in hexes adjacent to that hex.

name: Hunt in Concert
rule: Choose up to two friendly fighters and push each of them up to one hex.

name: Might of Kurnoth
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If cast, choose a friendly fighter. Their Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions have +1 Damage. This spell persists until the end of the round or until that fighter is taken out of action.

name: Pounce
rule: Push a friendly fighter up to three hexes so that they are adjacent to an enemy fighter that has one or more wound tokens.

name: Retrieve Javelin
rule: Your leader is no longer considered to have made a Javelin of the Hunt Attack action.

name: Song of Swiftness
rule: Friendly fighters have +1 Move. This effect persists until the end of the round or until the friendly Karthaen is taken out of action.

name: Strike in Concert
rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Damage for each friendly supporting fighter.

name: Swift as the Wind
rule: Choose a friendly fighter that has one or more Move tokens. Remove one of those tokens.

name: Battle Cry
rule: Action: Remove all Guard tokens from adjacent enemy fighters. Push all adjacent enemy fighters up to one hex.

name: Divine Strength
rule: This fighter's Attack actions have Knockback 1.

name: Eye of Kurnoth
rule: This fighter's Attack actions have +1 Dice. If the target is a Quarry, this fighter's Attack actions also have Ensnare.

name: Fast Shot
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's activation in which they made a Range 3+ Attack action, they make another Range 3+ Attack action.

name: Great Strides
rule: +2 Move.

name: Hale Charm
rule: When this fighter is dealt damage, reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

name: Hunting Aspect
rule:
+2 Move.
+1 Defence.
+1 Wounds.

name: Kurnoth's Mark
rule:
You can re-roll one dice in the defence roll when this fighter is the target of an Attack action.
Reaction: After a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, if this card is in your hand, give that friendly fighter this upgrade (do not spend any glory points).

name: Shield Slash
rule: [Hex 1 Hammer 2 Dmg 3]

name: Vicious Darts
rule: [Hex 3 Focus - Dmg 1] Ensnare. On a critical hit this Attack action has +1 Damage.

name: Bravely Done!
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter with one or more supporting fighters takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action.

name: Charnel House
rule:
Hybrid: Score this in the third end phase
If: All surviving friendly fighters are in enemy territory
Or: There are no enemy fighters in your territory.

name: Conquering Heroes
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

name: Defending the Hearth
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action in your territory.

name: Ghoul Pack
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if three or more friendly fighters are adjacent to the same enemy fighter.

name: Glory of the Court
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters are Inspired.

name: In the Name of the King
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds three or more objectives.

name: Incomprehensible Scheme
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds more objectives than each enemy warband.

name: Mordant Triumph
rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored five or more surge objective cards in this game.

name: Mouths to Feed
rule: Score this in an end phase if there are fewer surviving enemy fighters than there are enemy fighters out of action.

name: Pervasive Delusion
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when you play your third or subsequent gambit card in a single round.

name: Shifting Madness
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds the objective when the same number as the current round (e.g. objective 1 in the first round).

name: Appalling Visage
rule: Choose one friendly fighter and one adjacent enemy fighter. Push the chosen enemy fighter up to 2 hexes away from the chosen friendly fighter.

name: Combat Drill
rule: Reaction: After a friendly fighter's Move action made as part of a Charge action, choose another friendly fighter. The chosen fighter makes a Move action. The chosen fighter must end that Move action adjacent to the fighter making the Charge action.

name: Double Time
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Move action (but not during a superaction). That fighter makes another Move action.

name: Horrifying Spectacle
rule: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action or gambit that has dealt enough damage to an enemy fighter to take it out of action, but before removing the fighter from the battlefield. All friendly fighters adjacent to that fighter are Inspired.

name: Pack, Advance!
rule: Choose one or more friendly Crypt Ghouls and push each of the chosen fighters up to 2 hexes.

name: Recycled Riches
rule: Take all the cards from your power discard pile that have the Grymwatch warband symbol. Shuffle them face down, then add the top card to your hand. Return the other cards to your power discard pile.

name: Scrabbling Claws
rule: Choose one enemy fighter that has one or more upgrades and is adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. The chosen fighter's player picks one of that fighter's upgrades and discards it.

name: Shattering Impact
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action, if that fighter has one or more upgrades. Pick one of their upgrades and one of their target's upgrades. Both cards are discarded.

name: Stench of Victory
rule: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's successful Attack action, before the deal damage step. Choose another friendly fighter and push the chosen fighter up to 3 hexes so they are adjacent to the target.

name: Strident Summons
rule: A friendly Crakmarrow makes the Ghoul Call action.

name: Aura of Command
rule: Action: Choose two other friendly fighters. You cannot choose fighters with any Move or Charge tokens. Each of the chosen fighters makes a Move action.

name: Drawn to Weakness
rule: Reaction: After an activation, push this fighter 1 hex towards an enemy fighter that has one or more wound tokens.

name: Grip of Madness
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's Move action, if this fighter is holding an objective, place a Madness counter on this card.
